meanings.definition: To smoke excessively or too much.
meanings.sent1: He was oversmoking at the party, puffing on one cigarette after another.
meanings.sent2: She oversmoking every day is not good for her health.
meanings.sent3: The chimney felt jealous of the oversmoking fireplace.
meanings.sent4: Her car exhaust was oversmoking like a steam engine.
meanings.sent5: The room filled with a haze from his oversmoking habit.

meanings.definition: The act of smoking too much.
meanings.sent1: His oversmoking was evident from the smell on his clothes.
meanings.sent2: The doctor warned him about the dangers of oversmoking.
meanings.sent3: The oversmoking contest ended with no clear winner.
meanings.sent4: The oversmoking in the room made it hard to see across.
meanings.sent5: The oversmoking in the air made her cough uncontrollably.
